info.title: Fynd Platform's Application Side APIs v1.10.3

get.description: Get details of a cart linked to a specific customer using a unique cart ID. It offers an overview of the items, quantities, prices, and other relevant information associated with the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve all the items added in the cart.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve the price breakup of cart items.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve the cod charges in breakup of cart items.

parameters.name: assign_card_id
parameters.description: Token of user's debit or credit card.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Customer servicable area_code.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Select `true` to set/initialize buy now cart.

parameters.name: cart_type
parameters.description: The type of cart

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: The order type of shipment HomeDelivery - If the customer wants the order home-delivered PickAtStore - If the customer wants the handover of an order at the store itself.

200.description: Success. Returns a Cart object. Check the example shown below or refer `CartDetailResponse` for more details.

loyalty_points.description: Your cashback, referrals, and refund amount get credited to Fynd Cash which can be redeemed while placing an order.

head.summary: getCartLastModified | Get last modified timestamp of a cart
head.description: Retrieve the last modified timestamp of the cart using unique cart ID. It indicates the most recent update made to the cart's content or properties.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

200.description: Success. Receives last modifed timestamp in the header.

post.summary: addItems | Add items to a cart
post.description: Add product items to the customer's existing shopping cart. If there is no existing cart associated with the customer, it creates a new one and adds the items to it.

parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve all the items added in the cart.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve the price breakup of cart items.

parameters.name: area_code

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Select `true` to set/initialize buy now cart.

put.description: Delete all items from the user's cart and resets it to its initial state, providing a clean slate for new selections.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: cart_type
parameters.description: The type of cart

requestBody.description: Specify cart id list to archive/delete carts. Refer `DeleteCartRequest` for more details.

200.description: Success. Returns whether the cart has been deleted or not.

get.description: Get total count of items currently present in the customer's cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Boolean value to get buy_now cart.

200.description: Success. Returns the total count of items in a user's cart.

get.summary: getItemCountV2 | Count items in the cart according to cart_type
get.description: Use this API to get the total number of items present in cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Boolean value to get buy_now cart

200.description: Success. Returns the total count of items in a user's cart.

get.description: List all available coupons that customer can apply to their carts. It provides details about each coupon, including its code, discount amount, and applicable conditions.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Whether to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Product slug to fetch the available coupons.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a store.

200.description: Success. Returns a coupon object which has a list of all the eligible coupons. Refer `GetCouponResponse` for more details.

get.summary: getAddresses | Get a list of addresses for a customer
get.description: List all addresses saved by the customer, simplifying the checkout process by offering pre-saved address options for delivery.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Whether to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: mobile_no
parameters.description: Mobile number of the customer.

parameters.name: checkout_mode
parameters.description: Option to checkout for self or for others.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tag given to an address, e.g. work, home, office, shop.

parameters.name: is_default
parameters.description: Select `true` to fetch the default address.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Option to fetch address for the provided user_id.

200.description: Success. Returns an Address object containing a list of address saved in the account. Refer `GetAddressesResponse` for more details.

post.summary: addAddress | Creates a new address for a customer
post.description: Add a new address to their cart to save details such as name, email, contact information, and address.

requestBody.description: Add address details in the request body as shown below or refer `Address` for more details.

200.description: Success. Returns the address ID, a flag whether the address is set as default, and a success message. Refer `SaveAddressResponse` for more details.

get.summary: getAddressById | Get details for a single customer address
get.description: Get a specific customer address stored in the system by providing its unique identifier. This API provides detailed information about the address, including the recipient's name, address, city, postal code, and other relevant details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID allotted to the selected address.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: This is boolean to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: mobile_no
parameters.description: Mobile number of the customer.

parameters.name: checkout_mode
parameters.description: Option to checkout for self or for others.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tag given to an address, e.g. work, home, office, shop.

parameters.name: is_default
parameters.description: This is a boolean value. Select `true` to fetch the default address.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Option to fetch address for the provided user_id.

200.description: Success. Returns an Address object containing a list of address saved in the account. Refer `Address` for more details.

put.summary: updateAddress | Updates an existing customer address
put.description: Customer can modify the details of a previously saved addresses.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID allotted to the selected address.

requestBody.description: Add address details in the request body as shown below or refer `Address` for more details.

200.description: Success. Returns the address ID and a message indicating a successful address updation.

delete.summary: removeAddress | Removes an address from a customer's address list
delete.description: Delete an existing customer address from the system.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID allotted to the selected address.

200.description: Returns a Status object indicating the success or failure of address deletion.

post.summary: selectAddress | Select customer address for order processing
post.description: Select an address from the saved customer addresses and validates the availability of items in the cart. Additionally, it verifies and updates the delivery promise based on the selected address.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Whether to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve all the items added in the cart.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Select `true` to retrieve the price breakup of cart items.

requestBody.description: Pass address details in the request body as shown below or refer `SelectCartAddressRequest` for more details.

200.description: Success. Returns a Cart object as shown below. Refer `CartDetailResponse` for more details.

loyalty_points.description: Your cashback, referrals, and refund amount get credited to Fynd Cash which can be redeemed while placing an order.

get.description: Validate the applicability of a coupon code for the selected payment mode for the existing cart. This ensures the coupon's validity before proceeding with the payment process, enhancing user experience and preventing potential errors during transactions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Whether to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: address_id
parameters.description: ID allotted to an address.

parameters.name: payment_mode
parameters.description: Payment mode selected by the customer.

parameters.name: payment_identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of payment like ICIC, PAYTM.

parameters.name: aggregator_name
parameters.description: Payment gateway identifier.

parameters.name: merchant_code
parameters.description: Identifier used by payment gateway for a given payment mode, e.g. NB_ICIC, PAYTM.

parameters.name: iin
parameters.description: Debit/Credit card prefix (first 6 digit).

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Credit/Debit card issuer, e.g. VISA, MASTERCARD, RUPAY.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Card type, e.g. Credit, Debit.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: Saved card token reference id.

parameters.name: cart_type
parameters.description: Type of the cart.

200.description: Success. Returns a success message and the coupon validity. Refer `PaymentCouponValidate` for more details.

put.description: Update metadata associated with a cart, which includes customer preferences, delivery instructions, or any special requirements related to the cart items.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: Whether to get buy_now cart.

requestBody.description:
gstin: Pass gstin number to claim GST credit, e.g. 27AAPFU0939F1ZV checkout_mode: Pass checkout mode for current order as described below.
    self: Customer him self placing order staff:Placing order on behalf of customer comment: Set comments to be passed to order team during adding items, e.g. leave the package with my neighbour.

200.description: Returns a message indicating the success of cart meta updation as shown below.

400.description: Missing required Field

post.description: Generate a unique shareable link for the customer's cart for a specific sales channel. This link enables easy sharing of the cart contents with other users, facilitating collaborative shopping experiences.

requestBody.description: Pass object to generate share cart snapshot uid Cart id for sharing cart. meta Staff, ordering store and other store related data meta data to merge

200.description: Returns a URL to share and a token as shown below.

get.description: List all promotional offers available for the items in the cart, including details such as offer text, unique promotion ID, and validity period.

parameters.description: A short, human-readable, URL-friendly identifier of a product.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of offers to be fetched to show.

parameters.name: promotion_group
parameters.description: Type of promotion groups.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a store.

200.description: Success. Returns a array containing the available offers (if exists) on product via promotions. Refer `PromotionOffersResponse` for more details.

get.description: Get ladder offers associated for the items in the cart. Ladder offers provide discounts or special pricing based on item quantity, allowing users to benefit from bulk purchases or promotional deals.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: A short, human-readable, URL-friendly identifier of a product.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: Store uid of assigned store on PDP page. If not passed default first created ladder will be returned.

parameters.name: promotion_id
parameters.description: Get ladder information of given promotion id explicitely.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of offers to be fetched to show.

200.description: Success. Returns a object containing the applicable ladder price offers (if exists) on product. Refer `PromotionOffersResponse` for more details.

400.description: Item not found with provided `slug` query parameter

get.description: Get shipment details for the items in a cart, specific to the selected address. Shipment details include delivery promises, seller information, item details, and other relevant information.

parameters.name: pick_at_store_uid
parameters.description: ID of the store from where the order will be picked up by the customer, assuming the order_type is `PickAtStore`. This may or may not be the same as the ID of the ordering store.

parameters.name: ordering_store_id
parameters.description: ID of the store where the customer is ordering from.

parameters.name: i
parameters.description: This is a boolean value. Select `true` to retrieve all the items added in the cart.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: Select `true` for getting a payment option in response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cart.

parameters.name: buy_now
parameters.description: This is boolean to get buy_now cart.

parameters.name: address_id
parameters.description: ID allotted to the selected address.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: The PIN Code of the destination address, e.g. 400059.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: The order type of shipment HomeDelivery - If the customer wants the order home-delivered PickAtStore - If the customer wants the handover of an order at the store itself. Digital - If the customer wants to buy digital voucher ( for jiogames ).

200.description: Success. Returns delivery promise along with shipment details and price breakup. Refer `CartShipmentsResponse` for more details.

ChargeDistributionSchema.description: Charge distribution structure, used to refer the distribution logic for the entity such as Order, shipment, article

type.description:
This field defines the distribution type, e.g values('multi', 'single')
  multi: distribute the charges across all entity
  single: distribute the charges across to any one single entity

logic.description:
This field defines the distribution logic e.g values('apportion', 'equally') apportion: distribute charge amount based of weighted average amount of all the entity (like article with
           [10, 20] will get charge of 9 as [3, 6])
equally: distribute charge amount 'equally' to all the entity
